column1: In order to ensure the translation Magento coverage, please see the information in the lower paragraphs!
column2: In order to ensure the translation Magento coverage, please see the information in the lower paragraphs!

column1: To install the translation for the Magento Connect Manager, proceed as follows:
column2: To install the translation for the Magento Connect Manager, proceed as follows:

column1: In your Magento root directory in the subfolder "%s" rename the folder "%s" into "%s".
column2: In your Magento root directory in the subfolder "%s" rename the folder "%s" into "%s".

column1: The Magento Connect Manager should be changed to German now.
column2: The Magento Connect Manager should be changed to German now.

column1: If Magento is updated, in particular the module "Mage_Downloader", the settings of the Connect Manager will be overwritten!
column2: If Magento is updated, in particular the module "Mage_Downloader", the settings of the Connect Manager will be overwritten!

column1: The same applies to the TinyMCE editor. Run in the case a "Reinstall" the language pack and repeat the described steps.
column2: The same applies to the TinyMCE editor. Run in the case a "Reinstall" the language pack and repeat the described steps.

column1: The installed language pack only provides translations of in Magento existing texts. If you want to prepare your Magento store on the legal requirements in %s or expand common payment methods, we recommend to install the following additional extensions.
column2: Le pack de langue installée seulement fournit des traductions de textes existants dans Magento. Si vous voulez préparer votre boutique Magento sur les exigences juridiques en %s ou développer des modes de paiement, nous vous recommandons d'installer les extensions suivantes.
